summary: WARNING LIGHT CONSTANTLY REMAINS ON ON MY DASHBOARD REGARDING AIRBAGS- WHEN CHECKING I FOUND VEHICLE HAD AIRBAG RECALL.  MADE APPOINTMENT AT DEALERSHIP WHO SAID I HAD TO CONTACT MERCEDES.  SHORTLY THEREAFTER GOT LETTER FROM MERCEDES-BENZ USA LLC MARCH 2019 STATING THE PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG IS AFFECTED HOWEVER SUITABLE REPLACEMENT PART IS NOT AVAILABLE AND WILL SENT ANOTHER LETTER WHEN AVAILABLE.  TO DATE NOTHING RECEIVED OR DONE.  THE LETTER REFERENCES: NHTSA ID #19V0 10 - PND TAK PHASE 4.
